alert.note: Alert for Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 12 at 3:25PM MDT until April 12 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning remains in effect until 8 PM for very strong winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 221, 222, 224, 225 and 226 through 237, which includes Teller County, Fremont County, the San Luis Valley, the southeast mountains and all of the southeast plains.... ...Red Flag Warning has been issued from noon to 7 PM Wednesday for strong winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 224 and 226 through 237 which includes the San Luis Valley and all of the southeast plains... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 226 AND 229... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM MDT WEDNESDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 226 AND 229... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong winds and low humidity, which is in effect from noon to 7 PM MDT Wednesday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 226 and 229. * Winds...West 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph this evening. Westerly winds of 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph will develop once again late Wednesday morning and afternoon. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest
